Package passengers

Class Passenger

  • java.lang.Object
    • passengers.Passenger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    interfaces.ownCar, interfaces.usePublicTransport
    public class Passenger
extends java.lang.Object
implements interfaces.ownCar, interfaces.usePublicTransport
    Class which includes the properties of passengers in the transportation system.
    Author:
    Salim Kemal Tirit

    • Method Detail

      • ride

        public void ride​(vehicles.PublicTransport p,
                 locations.Location l)
        Checks if the passenger is appropriate to go to the arrival location and if so changes its location. Uses getPrice method from Bus and Train classes. Gives %50 discount for the bus and %20 discount if the passenger is discounted. Uses canRide method from parent class. Checks if the passenger has enough money to go. @see Location @see PublicTransport
        Specified by:
        ride in interface interfaces.usePublicTransport
        Parameters:
        p - Transportation type of the passenger.
        l - Headed location.

      • refillCard

        public void refillCard​(double amount)
        Adds given amount to travel card of the passenger.
        Specified by:
        refillCard in interface interfaces.usePublicTransport
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount to be added to passengers travel card.

      • refuel

        public void refuel​(double amount)
        Adds given amount to Car of the passenger if the passenger has one.
        Specified by:
        refuel in interface interfaces.ownCar
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount to be added to passengers Car.

      • drive

        public void drive​(locations.Location l)
        Checks if the passenger is appropriate to go to the arrival location by its own car. Uses getDistance method to find the distance and multiplies it with the fuel consumption of the car to find the fuel used. Then changes the location of the passenger. @see Car @see Location
        Specified by:
        drive in interface interfaces.ownCar
        Parameters:
        l - Headed location

      • purchaseCar

        public void purchaseCar​(double fuelConsumption)
        Creates a car for the passenger and changes drivers license status to true.
        Specified by:
        purchaseCar in interface interfaces.ownCar
        Parameters:
        fuelConsumption - Fuel consumption rate of the car.
        See Also:
        Car

        public java.lang.String toString()
